content:
My healthcare employer is hosting a 3-day "hackweek" (Dec 5-7) and I would like to contribute to the smart-on-fhir/client-py project.

I was thinking of browsing the issues and picking a few that look approachable, but would appreciate some feedback/guidance from project contributors.
I created a couple of Flask Apps using the FHIR Client. I also (over)use Python string templating to create resources and even mappings along with the FHIR Client.
